import React from 'react' import Timeline from './Timeline'; import axios from 'axios'; class SignalPost extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ commentBox:'', postData:[] } this.state.postData=this.props.location.state; } handleSubmit=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); const comment={comment:this.state.commentBox,postId:this.props.location.state._id,personId:this.props.location.state.id} axios.post('http://localhost:8086/addcomment',comment). then((data)=>{ if(data!==false){ console.log('data returned after adding comment',data); this.setState({postData:data}); } }) } handleInput=(event)=>{ this.setState({commentBox:event.target.value}); } render(){ return (
Singal Post
{this.props.location.state.title}
{this.props.location.state .category}
{this.props.location.state.email}
{new Date(this.props.location.state.date).toLocaleDateString()} {new Date(this.props.location.state.date).toLocaleTimeString()}
